content: अनघ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Sinless, innocent; अवैमि चैनामनघेति <ls>R. 14. 40.</ls> {@--2@} Free from blame, faultless, handsome; रूपमनघं <ls>Ś. 2. 10</ls>; यस्य ज्ञानदयासिंधोरगाधस्यानघा गुणाः <ls>Ak.</ls>; °सर्वगात्री <ls>Dk. 123.</ls> {@--3@} Without mishap or accident, free from danger, calamity &c.; safe, unhurt; यास्त्वामनघमद्राक्ष्म <ls>Dk. 108</ls>; कच्चिन्मृगीणामनघा प्रसूतिः <ls>R. 5. 7</ls>; मृगवधूर्यदा अनघप्रसवा भवति <ls>Ś. 4</ls> safely delivered or brought to bed; °प्रसूतेः <ls>R. 14. 75.</ls> {@--4@} Without grief or sorrow; दयालुमनघस्पृष्टं <ls>R. 10. 19.</ls> {@--5@} Free from dirt, impurities &c., pure, spotless; <ls>R. 13. 65</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 80</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">31.</ls> --घः {@--1@} White mustard. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu; अनघो विजयो जेता; also of Śiva and of several other persons, a Gandharva, Sādhya &c.
